data_quality_assurance: The data is organized in files and folders in the filesystem.
Since the input and output data are static, there is no need for (re-)calibration or repeated measurements and data reviews
Consistency and correctness checks will be performed on a sample basis, as well as code refactorings.
dataset.description: Shows the progression of the gross revenue in the USA and the IMDb user score of movies which have won the Oscar in the category "Best Picture" and were released between 1986 and 2016 in the form of a raw dataset (CSV) and a visualization (PNG chart).

distribution.description: Shows the progression of the gross revenue in the USA and the IMDb user score of movies which have won the Oscar in the category "Best Picture" and were released between 1986 and 2016 in the form of a raw dataset (CSV) and a visualization (PNG chart).

host.description: Zenodo is hosted by CERN as part of its mission to make available the result of its work.
host.storage_type: Disk cluster with replicas on different disk servers
host.title: Zenodo

distribution.title: Progression of Revenue and IMDb Score of Oscar "Best Picture" Winners From 1986 Until 2016

metadata.description: Provides a vocabulary for documenting research data, along with an XML serialization. It specializes in earth and environmental sciences, but is well-suites for other discplines, too.
Collection of common metadata elements about digital images, especially for PNG images such as IHDR, tEXt, pHYs.

methodology.description: The data is a result of a Python script aggregating source data into a consolidated CSV format and producing a PNG chart from the raw result data.

security_and_privacy.description: Write-Access to data is only permitted using credentials that belong to the project creator
security_and_privacy.title: Access Control

security_and_privacy.description: Backups are performed at least twice a week. Data is stored redundantly at four locations.
security_and_privacy.title: Data Security

security_and_privacy.description: The project neither processes nor produces sensitive or personal data. Hence, no actions to protect any of the data need to be taken.
security_and_privacy.title: Privacy

target_audience: Researchers with a focus on recent developments in the movie industry.
People interested in the history and development of movie popularity and Oscar awards.
